current.home-featured-promo-description: Block Shop theme boasts spacious layouts, block colours, bold typography with a minimal user interface that endures trends with simplicity and style. Content is divided in large customisable blocks giving you freedom to adjust layout, colour, typography and UI elements to represent your brand with boldness and clarity. Retina-ready, full responsive for widescreen and mobile devices, the Block Shop is your one stop shop.
